title: Team Up and Pool Party coming up!

replies.body: If we have already connected through fb do we still get a mystery champ :o
what if we already own all champions too?
I'm not sure, but I hope we do :/
same here
Love this idea riot!
Nah, It'll make carrying ranked too hard because we will have too many one-handed players if we get a skin as sexy as that.
Hopefully they make a Japanese Schoolgirl {{champion:6}} skin soon...
Wait so do we get pool party mundo for free if we can get the points to 55 million??{{champion:36}}
Yup!
Awesome!
does this mean when we reach 55 million points pool party mundo will be unlockedd to buy? or unlocked for free to all summoners who participated

Okay Just to answer some question out there. 
1: Yes if we reach 55mil  points we unlock mundo and his pool party skin for free.
2: If you own every champion and was wondering what you get for reward 3. then 
you get a mystery skin and if you own every skin (TBH I don't think anyone on this planet would want to own every skin!) you get 490 RP gifted to you.
3: this is for all servers to participate in not just OCE! 

GG WP 
LoL Hylee

Hi riot,
If we don't have mundo, will we get mundo and the skin if we make that goal.

Sorry but is this event going to be adjusted for the OCE region? I've noticed this is the same post from NA.

Some worries I have is that the point goal is too high considering the requirements to gain points (winning only in 5 man premade or gifting) and I don't think the OCE community can perform well in this.

Ocean week was a bit different since you just had to play an ocean week champion, but if you want to do this the free way you'll have to have a 5 man premade ready. 55 million points in a week for the final goal sounds extremely hard for OCE to achieve as well.
hi, sure this is for the WHOLE league of legends community which includes all servers, glad i could help - ur welcome
It's a global effort, as Azamalaza explained, it's all regions.
I bet we are gonna get the most wins cause the other regions are gay lol, AUSTRALIA WOO OI OI OI
What if you don't have Facebook? Is there still a way we can earn the mystery champ? Because I am not allowed to have Facebook because of my parents. :-/
What happened to Pool party {{champion:254}} and {{champion:51}} T^T
Do we still get the mystery champion of we already connected to Facebook?
So you expect us to play 1 million games earning 5 points a game, 20-50 mins game to get Pool Party Mundo?? Um this is over the top Riot!
There is many many people that play this game, I doubt that we (the community) can't do it.

cheeky m9 everyones points get put together
{{champion:36}}
so i feel that if we get 100 mill points they should bring back urf for a month with the pool party minions who agrees?
YESSSSSSSSSSS but how the hell will we get to 100 mill points
so do we still get the champion if we already connected to fb friends?
Pitty I use none of these characters.. Lol ..
Do we need {{champion:36}} to get the free {{champion:36}} skin

I think its what champ get turned into when {{champion:117}}  uses her W i think it is.

CUTE as a button IMO
I dont get it plzz explain??
But Pool Noodle {{champion:62}}  tho.... T~T {{summoner:4}}
thats rek'sai draven is sitting on right?
Yep!
SWEET That is so cool guys lets get 55 mil
K guys, if we reach the 6th reward, we all get {{champion:36}} and his skin **for free!** if you already own {{champion:36}}  then you will just get his skin!
no you dont? i thought it was just unlocking him
well what does it say when you buy champs or skins it says Unlocked
love it
I go on holidays when it starts and it leaves the day i comeback{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Need Pool Party {{champion:44}} and {{champion:81}}

POOL PARTY{{champion:421}} i am so gonna buy that in a {{summoner:4}} it looks awesome.

and PP {{champion:154}} SOOOOOO COOL
Her*
Why are those of us who choose not to use facebook being discriminated against?

Love how he says "discriminated against" as if its some heinous crime that Riot is putting upon people. The week is about making and playing with new and old friends. The new facebook recommendation system helps that and there is no harm in using it. Unless for some reason your too scared to get facebook... lol it isn't very hard. But hey like you said, it's your choice, but the people who make the right choice get rewarded. Its as simple as that.

Ok so maybe I was being a little melodramatic.. but still this is the thing, I once had Facebook but made the choice to opt out for various reasons. 
like you say the "right"choice will be rewarded but why is it the right choice? at least offer the equal option for other social media...
